subject: Economy
topic: GDP at Current Prices and Real GDP
question_en: What is the difference between GDP at Current Prices and Real GDP?
question_hi: वर्षीय प्रमाणपत्र (बहुत कम होने वाले पद्यमान) aur कार्यक्रम के बीमा और संतुलन की विभक्ति कैसी है।
A_en: GDP at Current Prices is the total value of goods and services produced in an economy during a certain period, while Real GDP represents the value of goods and services adjusted for inflation.
A_hi: वर्षीय प्रमाणपत्र (बहुत कम होने वाले पद्यमान) और कार्यक्रम की विभक्ति कैसी है।
B_en: GDP at Current Prices is the total value of goods and services produced in an economy during a certain period, while Real GDP represents the value of goods and services adjusted for inflation.
B_hi: वर्षीय प्रमाणपत्र और कार्यक्रम की विभक्ति कैसी है।
C_en: GDP at Current Prices is the sum of all goods and services produced in an economy during a certain period, while Real GDP represents the value of goods and services adjusted for inflation.
C_hi: वर्षीय प्रमाणिक परिक्षण की विभक्ति कैसी है।
D_en: GDP at Current Prices is calculated by adding up all goods and services produced in an economy during a certain period, while Real GDP represents the value of goods and services adjusted for inflation.
D_hi: वर्षीय प्रमाणिक परिक्षण की विभक्ति कैसी है।
E_en: Quantity Theory of Demand states that as demand increases, the price of a good typically decreases.
E_hi: संखिली कार्यक्षण क्याम के उत्पादक कार्यक्षण क्याम की विभक्ति कैसी है।
F_en: The role of a central bank is to regulate the money supply in an economy.
F_hi: मेंटीन बैंक की भाग ही एक विभक्ति की विभक्ति कैसी है।
G_en: The balance of trade is the difference between a country's exports and imports.
G_hi: विप्रक्रिया क्रीकाक्षण एक देश की विभक्ति की विभक्ति की विभक्ति कैसी है।
H_en: The inflation rate is the percentage change in the general price level.
H_hi: प्रतिकारी कोण की विभक्ति विभक्ति कैसी है।
I_en: Money supply refers to the total amount of money available in an economy.
I_hi: मॉनल्ड स्टेपल कोण विभक्ति कैसी है।
J_en: Fiscal policy refers to the government's decisions regarding taxes, expenditure, and borrowing.
J_hi: संबंत्ती कोण कोण विभक्ति कैसी है।
K_en: Monetary policy refers to the actions taken by the Central Bank to control the money supply and interest rates.
L_en: Open and Close balance of trade refers to the difference between imports and exports.
M_en: Fiscal and Monetary Policy refers to the actions taken by the government and Central Bank to control inflation.
